extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites     DRAM100 or DRAM181 or (BISC100 and BISC101) or permission of the Department.

basic.description: A seminar course devoted to the exploration of a range of dramatic works from the Medieval period in England. Students will read works from both religious and secular traditions, including liturgical drama, morality plays, cycle dramas and interludes.
basic.subject: DRAM
basic.title: Medieval Dramatic Literature
